Message: My story is also my big sis’s story.

The only reason I’m here is
because of her, after all.

was when I accidentally
realized I had strange powers.

I didn’t learn they were
the powers of a witch
until much later.
Look at what I can do!

When I showed off my powers
to them, their expressions
immedietly dropped,

and I was thrown out of
the house like a bag of garbage.

“If I knew you were going
to be a witch, I would never
have given birth to you.”

But, this door was never
going to open for me again.

And when I realized that,
tears began falling from my eyes.

The door opened again,
and the one who came
flying out...
